summary: A patch to reqtify almost all individual mods by PrivateEye.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5]Please read the entire description![/size][/b]

[b]As most of you might know, PrivateEye has created many other mods apart from Heavy Armory. These include various artifacts from previous Elder Scrolls games (especially Morrowind). I felt these fit into Requiem really well and encourage exploration. So, I've taken the liberty to patch them for the same, changing stats,adding keywords from:Â [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61520/?]Kryptopyr's Fixes Reqtified[/url] as well as changing item descriptions to match Requiem's style.

Currently, the patch covers:
1. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14429/?]Mace of Aevar Stone Singer[/url]
2. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37175/?]Adamantium Helm of Tohan
[/url]3. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17096/?]Chrysamere[/url]

The remaining artifacts will come soon.
Note: The patch does not come with the mod assets packaged. You need to download the original mod and activate their esps too.

Recommended Load Order:

.
.
Item_mod1.esp
Item_mod2.esp
.
.
PrvtlHelmTohan.esp
MaceofAevar.esp
PrvtlChrysamere.esp
Requiem.esp
.
.
Item_mod1-Requiem patch.esp
Item_mod2-Requiem patch.esp
Requiem Old Artifacts Patch.esp
.
.
Requiem for the Indifferent.esp

Footnote:
I've learnt using Tes5edit and CK TODAY. So, yeah..problems might be there. Feel free to inspect the patch in Tes5edit yourself and do post if you find any issues with the patch (hopefully not..).

[size=5]CREDITS:[/size]
PrivateEye - For making the amazing mods that he does!
Xarrian and Ogerboss - For creating Requiem and especially Ogerboss for maintaining it in a professional way.
FadingSignal - without whose videos I wouldn't have dared used Tes5edit.
Bethesda - Obviously.
author: amey25442038
